txt.en: The miner Siam was wounded during the attempt to flee the Barnavon Mine, but managed to hide from the bugan.
'Ah! Help has come at last! I have been trapped here for days... will you help me to escape?\n\n'I have little to offer, but perhaps Cada can part with some gold?'
Siam is awaiting rescue in the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should escort Siam to the mine entrance.
'Aye, Siam just returned, and his wounds are now being tended.\n\n'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder].'
Cada is outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should return to Cada and let him know that Siam is safe.
'I am ready to go, friend. Thank you for your help!'
Talk to Cada at the mine
